“冁1”的繁体字。

囅字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　囅； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页215第06
【集韻】丑展切，音蕆。囅然笑貌。　又【類篇】敕列切，音徹。義同。◎按辴囅二字，諸韻書音義大同小異，應卽一字，譌分爲二。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　冁; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 215 06
【Ji Yun】Ugly show cut, sound 蒇. Enigmatically smiling.　[Classes] Election, and sound. The same meaning. ◎According to the two characters 辴冁, all rhyme books have similar sounds and meanings, and the word Ying卽 is divided into two.
